disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Sunday 27 February to end of Sunday 27 February GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Sunday is forecast to be similar to Saturday, bright and dry with a southerly breeze.<br/><br/>Back-trajectories show air arriving at the South-East having taken a fairly long track through Germany and France. This is often associated with an import of particulate pollution. The speed of the air and it's low residence time is not expected to result in Moderate particulate pollution on Sunday.<br/><br/>Air pollution is though expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 28 February to end of Monday 28 February GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Monday is forecast to be overcast with rain and a continuing southerly breeze.<br/><br/>Back-trajectories show air arriving having taken a path up across the Bay of Biscay. This track is not typically associated with significant import of pollution.<br/><br/>Air pollution is though expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>
